components.name: BasicInfoComponent
ButtonComponent

propertiesClass.name: isHovered
propertiesClass.defaultValue: false

components.templateData:
<button class="px-4 py-2 pb-[11.5px]" [class.border]="showBorder" [ngStyle]="{
    backgroundColor: isHovered ? hoverBGColor : bgColor,
    color: isHovered ? hoverColor : color,
    borderRadius: borderRadius+'%',
    borderColor: borderColor
  }" (mouseenter)="isHovered = true" (mouseleave)="isHovered = false">
  {{ text }}
</button>

  { name: '2', value: 2 },
  { name: '3', value: 3 },
  { name: '4', value: 4 },

]

propertiesClass.defaultValue:
[
    { name: 'HR', value: 1 },
    { name: 'IT', value: 2 },
    { name: 'Finance', value: 3 },

propertiesClass.name: designationOptions
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
[
  { name: 'Software Engineer', value: 'software_engineer' },
        { name: 'Senior Software Engineer', value: 'senior_software_engineer' },
        { name: 'Team Lead', value: 'team_lead' },
        { name: 'Project Manager', value: 'project_manager' },

]

  { name: '5', value: 5 },

]
